relic_sets.desc: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).
relic_sets.name: Band of Sizzling Thunder

relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.
relic_sets.name: Inert Salsotto

skills.desc: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of his ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 87% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.
skills.name: Rifting Zenith
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action.

skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 180% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.
skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.simple_desc: Deals Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action.

skills.desc:
Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 66% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.
The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.
When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.
When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.
skills.name: Prana Extirpated

skills.desc: After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3 at the start of the next battle.
skills.name: Spirit Invocation

relic_sets.desc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.
relic_sets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars

relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.
relic_sets.name: Space Sealing Station

skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Thwack
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 220% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Sheathed Blade
skills.simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and increases SPD.

skills.desc: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 403% of her ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: Butterfly Flurry
skills.simple_desc: Enters the buffed state and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.desc:
Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 75% for 1 turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."
skills.name: Resurgence

skills.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.
skills.name: Phantom Illusion

light_cone.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat

relic_sets.desc: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.
relic_sets.name: Pan-Galactic Commercial Enterprise

skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 70% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.
skills.name: System Warning
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.desc:
There is a 82% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field character's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered.
Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept.
In addition, there is a 100% base chance to further reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy by 9.4% for 2 turn(s).
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 171% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.
skills.name: Allow Changes?
skills.simple_desc: There is a high chance to apply additional Type Weaknesses to a single enemy and deals Quantum DMG to this target enemy.

skills.desc: There's a 96% base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by 42.8% for 3 turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to 342% of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.
skills.name: User Banned
skills.simple_desc: Has a high chance of lowering a single enemy's DEF and deals massive Quantum DMG to this target enemy.

skills.desc:
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by 7.5%, reduce DEF by 6.0%, and reduce SPD by 4.5%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a 66% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for 3 turn(s) in an enemy target.
skills.name: Awaiting System Response...
skills.simple_desc: After each attack, there is a chance of inflicting the attacked enemy with 1 random Bug.

skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.
skills.name: Force Quit Program
skills.simple_desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor amounts of DMG to all enemies and reduces Toughness of all enemies irrespective of Weakness Types.
